lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Explaining its request for the amendment, Siemens informed Telecom it had recently become aware of information causing concern with respect to certain accounting and other matters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Telecom Plus International Inc said <Siemens AG>'s Siemens Information Systems wants to amend its agreement to purchase Telecom's 65 pct interest in Tel Plus Communications to delay payment of 25 mln dlrs for 11 months.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Telecom said the proposed amendment would also permit Siemens to defer repayment of up to an additional 50 pct of certain intercompany debt until completion of the review.
